function.name: etadata_and_stats_play_counts_for_indie_songs_distrokid_unsigned
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "indie_songs_distrokid_unsigned", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get all tracks with full metadata including recent Spotify play counts.

Also Apple song URL, Spotify song URL, Composer name, ISRC, Label, Release date, Genres, Apple IDs, Spotify IDs are included."

function.name: get_top_50_indie_songs_for_indie_songs_distrokid_unsigned
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "indie_songs_distrokid_unsigned", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get TOP 50 indie songs based on their daily stream increase ratio"

function.name: get_csv_of_top_50_indie_songs_for_indie_songs_distrokid_unsigned

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm a music enthusiast and I want to discover new indie songs. Can you give me a list of the top 50 indie songs based on their daily stream increase ratio? Additionally, I would like to know the full metadata, including recent Spotify play counts, for these songs.
